mapper.insert: insert into ecs_volume_price (price_type, goods_id, volume_number, volume_price) values (#{price_type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{volume_number,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{volume_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select price_type, goods_id, volume_number, volume_price from ecs_volume_price
